item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>Actually it's going to be Dad!!! As I have to drive to Solihull on Friday/Sat and then back to a party on Sat night he said he would do tomorrow. All fine at your house - Mary Anne says to tell you it is grey and damp here !! We will probably go to Cretingham Bell for Sun lunch - Dad wondered if you would like lunch at the club on Fri?? See you at the weekend</p>
item.content:encoded: Actually it’s going to be Dad!!! As I have to drive to Solihull on Friday/Sat and then back to a party on Sat night he said he would do tomorrow. All fine at your house – Mary Anne says to tell you it is grey and damp here !! We will probably go to Cretingham Bell for Sun lunch – Dad wondered if you would like lunch at the club on Fri?? See you at the weekend

item.title: By: Si and Fi again
item.dc:creator: Si and Fi again
item.description: <p>Apologies for the appalling grammer in the last message!</p>
item.content:encoded: Apologies for the appalling grammer in the last message!

item.title: By: Si and Fi
item.dc:creator: Si and Fi
item.description: <p>Matthew, hope your flight home is OK and that you get over the worst of your jet lag. Did you enjoy Daredevil by the way? We thought it was pretty good, better than Spiderman by the way, maybe it's because we watched in New York!</p>
item.content:encoded: Matthew, hope your flight home is OK and that you get over the worst of your jet lag. Did you enjoy Daredevil by the way? We thought it was pretty good, better than Spiderman by the way, maybe it’s because we watched in New York!
